title: Divya Choker Haaram with Emerald Pendant and South Sea Pearls
features: Intricately designed choker necklace featuring floral motifs embellished with sparkling diamonds. The central element showcases a pear-shaped Zambian emerald surrounded by diamonds. Matching emerald pendant with similar diamond work and pearl drops. The necklace is adorned with delicate South Sea pearl drops, offering a classic and elegant appeal. Classic open setting style to allow maximum light to enhance brilliance of the diamonds.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Also suitable for contemporary events where a touch of traditional elegance is desired.
description: A timeless masterpiece crafted with the finest materials and unparalleled craftsmanship. The combination of diamonds, emeralds, rubies, and South Sea pearls creates a stunning visual harmony. A heritage piece to be cherished for generations, reflecting South Indian artistic legacy. Makes an excellent wedding gift.
